devdoc.details: This contract implements a proxy that allows to change the implementation address to which it will delegate. Such a change is called an implementation upgrade. * Credit: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-sdk/blob/master/packages/lib/contracts/upgradeability/BaseUpgradeabilityProxy.sol
